channel.title: Breakfast for Dinner on Edible Reveries

item.title: Apple Oatmeal Waffles
item.description:
Apple Oatmeal Waffles

adapted from Mr. Breakfast.com

1 1/2 cups flour

1 cup oats

1 teaspoon baking powder

1 teaspoon baking soda

1 1/2 teaspoons cinnamon

1/2 teaspoon nutmeg

2 eggs

1 1/2 cups buttermilk

4 tablespoons vegetable oil

2 tablespoons brown sugar

1/2 teaspoon vanilla

2 Granny Smith apples grated

Whisk together dry ingredients in large bowl. Beat eggs in separate bowl; add wet ingredients and sugar, stir. Fold in grated apple. Cover and let sit for 1 hour
